title: Stablecoin yield debate: US Treasury gets conflicting advice on GENIUS Act
summary: While Coinbase insists that the US Treasury cannot override Congress’s intent on the GENIUS Act, banks continue to press for a blanket ban on stablecoin interest.

title: Privacy coins surge 80%: Why Zcash and Dash are back in the spotlight
summary: Privacy coins surge 80% as Zcash and Dash hit multi-year highs, driven by rotation, halving hype and renewed demand for transaction privacy.

title: Spanish research institute to sell $10M Bitcoin stash bought for $10K in 2012
summary: Researchers bought 97 BTC in 2012 for a blockchain study. Thirteen years later, they’re selling the stash to fund quantum research projects.

title: Kalshi, Polymarket traders bet Supreme Court will curb Trump’s tariff powers
summary: Prediction markets show waning confidence in Trump’s tariff authority, with both Kalshi and Polymarket traders bracing for limits on executive power.

title: How to spot bull and bear market traps in crypto before they catch you
summary: Learn to spot fake breakouts in crypto using funding, OI and volume signals — and avoid bull and bear trap setups.

title: US spot Bitcoin ETFs bleed over $2B in second-worst outflow streak ever
summary: While Bitcoin and Ether ETFs saw continued outflows this week, Solana ETFs bucked the trend, extending their winning streak to seven days.

title: True autonomy is the only way machines can belong to us
summary: Teleoperated robots offer the illusion of autonomy while requiring human controllers. Actual progress demands local processing, encrypted data ownership and independence.

title: Bitcoin faces ‘insane’ sell wall above $105K as stocks eye tariff ruling
summary: Bitcoin price upside was limited as suspicions rose over the owner of a large wall of sell orders stretching to the $112,000 mark.

title: Can the biggest Bitcoin whales really decide when the market turns green or red?
summary: Whales still move prices, but ETF flows, exchange liquidity, and macro shifts now decide Bitcoin’s daily color.

title: Bitcoin bull run hasn’t started yet: Jan3’s Samson Mow
summary: Jan3 founder Samson Mow also argued that fears of Bitcoin OGs selling are overblown and traders should focus on the next bull run, rather than “self-owning themselves.”
